pages.text: The Wither (Robotogolem marcescefer) is a native Minecraft creature: it is created by placing three Wither Skulls onto a body of Soul Sand. It is extremely dangerous and hostile, capable of inflicting great damage to players, other entities, and the general landscape.

pages.name: Wither
pages.text: To create a Wither, place three wither skulls on top of a body of soul sand.
